jd: From: Deepak kumar, USG deepakv@usgrpinc.com Reply to: deepakv@usgrpinc.com Hi,I'm Deepak Kumar, part of the United Software Group, Inc. We have a job opening with one of our clients, and we're checking if you're available for a job or if you know someone who might be interested. If you're interested, please send your resume to Deepakv@usgrpinc.com as soon as possible. Job Title: Senior Liferay ArchitectLocation: Remote Job Type: Contract Responsibilities:The following is essential:• Liferay version 7.4• AWS • React • JavaJob descriptionArchitect that have both back end and front end Liferay experienceDevelop and implement end-to-end solutions using Liferay PortalCollaborate with cross-functional teams to gather requirements and design efficient solutionsCreate and maintain Liferay themes, portlets, extensions, and other customizationsEnsure the performance, scalability, and security of Liferay applicationsTroubleshoot and resolve issues related to Liferay deploymentFollow Agile and Scrum methodologies for project executionConduct unit testing and provide support for integration and system testingCandidate Qualifications:Minimum 5-8 years of significant IT experience in Java/JavaEE technologiesStrong understanding of Liferay Portal and web portal technologyExcellent knowledge of Java 8+, Java EE 7/8, and related conceptsExperience with frameworks like Spring, Spring Boot, and HibernateFamiliarity with web development technologies such as HTML5, CSS, JavaScript, and jQueryWorking experience with Agile, Scrum, and DevOps processesStrong communication and problem-solving skills
